title: Science Learning Task Sequencing Design Based on Fuzzy Logic

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customized task design for novice professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply principles of fuzzy logic-based instructional strategies
Learners can analyze scientific learning tasks using a 0-1 scale based on subjective correlations
Learners can derive all possible combinations of learning task sequences under given constraints
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
